REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0895 reute r f BC-TELCO-<TELC>-DELAYS-D 03-12 0046

TEXT.TITLE: TELCO <TELC> DELAYS DEFENSIVE RIGHTS OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Telco Systems Inc said its plan to distribute a dividend of common stock purchase rights to shareholders of record on March 16 has been delayed pending the completion of necessary regulatory approvals. Reuter
